findings.title: Inconsistent Naming Conventions and Misleading Function/Variable Names
findings.description: The codebase exhibits inconsistent use of naming conventions, alternating between camel case and underscore naming, and misleading function and variable names that can cause confusion about their purpose and functionality.

findings.title: Lack of Inline Code Documentation
findings.description: The codebase lacks inline documentation, reducing maintainability and making it challenging for new developers and auditors to understand the code as it grows.
